meanings.definition: A basic unit of classification in linguistics.
meanings.sent1: In linguistics, a taxeme helps organize words into categories.
meanings.sent2: The linguist used the taxeme to group similar words together.
meanings.sent3: The taxeme threw a party for all the nouns and verbs in the sentence.
meanings.sent4: The taxeme acted as a sorting hat, assigning words to their proper groups.
meanings.sent5: The taxeme was like a puzzle piece, fitting words into their linguistic categories.

meanings.definition: A basic unit of classification in biology.
meanings.sent1: Biologists use the taxeme to classify different species of animals.
meanings.sent2: The taxeme helped scientists understand the relationships between organisms.
meanings.sent3: The taxeme went on a vacation to explore the diversity of species.
meanings.sent4: The taxeme was a detective, solving the mystery of evolutionary relationships.
meanings.sent5: The taxeme was a key that unlocked the secrets of biological classification.
